scripts.start:dev: cd ./meow-frontend && npm i && npm run build && rm -rf ../meow-server/public &&  mkdir ../meow-server/public && mv ./build/* ../meow-server/public && cd ../meow-server && npm i && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod: cd ./meow-frontend && npm i && npm run build && rm -rf ../meow-server/public &&  mkdir ../meow-server/public && mv ./build/* ../meow-server/public && cd ../meow-server && npm i && npm run start:prod
